mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_user (empno, userid, pwd, email, profile) VALUES(#{empno}, #{userid}, #{pwd}, #{email}, #{profile})
INSERT INTO T_emp (empno, ename, hdate, pnum) VALUES(to_number(SUBSTR(#{hdate},1,6)||LPAD(T_emp_seq.nextval,4,0)), #{ename}, to_date(#{hdate}, 'yyyymmdd'), #{pnum})
mapper.select: SELECT e.empno, e.ename, TO_CHAR(hdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS hdate, e.pnum, u.userid, u.email, u.profile FROM T_user u, T_emp e WHERE e.empno=u.empno AND u.userid=#{id}

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM T_emp
WHERE ename LIKE '%'||#{ename}||'%'
